price: Mereka berkata, "Jika ia benar-benar dimakan serigala, sedang kami golongan (yang kuat); sesungguhnya kami kalau demikian adalah orang-orang yang merugi 745".
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِنۡ أَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ
footnotes: 745.  Maksudnya, menjadi orang-orang pengecut yang hidupnya tidak ada artinya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in akalahu al-dhi'bu wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun innā idhan lakhāsirūna
